segments.text: I'm just taking in the whole tableau, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman diligently drying her plate, completely oblivious to the rising tide around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on full blast, yet she seems to hear nothing, see nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, there are the children, so focused on their sweet conquest, balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly surprising how much is happening simultaneously, with absolutely no one aware of the larger picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself shaking my head at the sheer lack of situational awareness from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a series of accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the peaceful garden outside is almost ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm constantly amazed by the little dramas that unfold unnoticed in everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a moment to stumble upon.
segments.speaker: PAR
